title: No, fake photo doesn’t show South Africa’s President Cyril Ramaphosa ‘dancing like nyaope boys’
subtitle: An
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
on Facebook in South Africa claims to show the country’s president, Cyril Ramaphosa, “dancing like

on the floor”. Nyaope is a cheap and addictive

In the image the president is lying on his back, smiling and with his hands raised, while a woman dances above him.

of the image has been shared over 3,000 times. The user comments: “The whole State President Mr #CyrilRamaphosa DANCING like Nyaope Boys on the floor, no wonder we are just a laughing stock by other countries, this

and is a composite of two different events

version of a photo taken by South African photographer

, snapped on 27 February 2019, shows Ramaphosa testing a bed made by informal artisans in Khayelitsha, a large township near Cape Town.

Ramaphosa was on a campaign drive for the ruling

The image of the woman used in the fake photo seems to have been taken from a YouTube video titled

Jacob Zuma was also given the same treatment when a widely shared photo of the former president dancing rather intimately with singer Babes Wodumo went viral in 2016.
